channel.title: Making monster not respawn when summoning?(modified summon)
channel.description: I'm trying to make like if you eat an easter egg a monster will summon but it saves as NPC ID = 1027 ( the code to make drops ) and when it dies it respawns back...is there a way to make it not spawn back? Thanks ^^ [br][size=1]Posted at: August 31, 2006, 12:21:46 PM[/size][hr]anyone? =/ ~bump
